name.description: Field name used as mapping reference.

displayText.description: Text to use within the label.

labelHtml.description: HTML to use within the label. If is provided, the displayText option will be ignored.

isPageHeading.description: Whether the label also acts as the heading for the page.

labelClasses.description: Classes to add to the label.

prefix.description: Can be used to add a prefix to the text input component.

autocomplete.description: Attribute to identify input purpose, for instance 'postal-code' or 'username'. See autofill for full list of attributes that can be used.

classes.description: HTML classes to add to the input.

hint.description: Can be used to add a hint to a text input component.
